title: DEPICT: Diffusion Enabled Permutation Importance for Image Classification Tasks
authors: Sarah Jabbour, Gregory Kondas, Ella Kazerooni, Michael W. Sjoding, David Fouhey, Jenna Wiens
description: Extends permutation feature importance to images by using text‑conditioned diffusion to generate dataset‑level explanations for image classifiers.

title: Measuring the Impact of AI in the Diagnosis of Hospitalized Patients
authors: Sarah Jabbour, David Fouhey, Stephanie Shepard, Thomas S. Valley, Ella A. Kazerooni, Nikola Banovic, Jenna Wiens, Michael W. Sjoding
description: Presents a randomized vignette survey showing that AI explanations do not significantly help clinicians recover from incorrect AI recommendations.

title: Learning Concept Credible Models for Mitigating Shortcuts
authors: Jiaxuan Wang, Sarah Jabbour, Maggie Makar, Michael W. Sjoding, Jenna Wiens
description: Introduces a regularization penalty that encourages models to focus on meaningful clinical concepts instead of spurious correlations.

title: Combining Chest X‑rays and Electronic Health Records to Diagnose Acute Respiratory Failure
authors: Sarah Jabbour, David Fouhey, Ella Kazerooni, Jenna Wiens, Michael W. Sjoding
description: Builds a multimodal model that predicts causes of acute respiratory failure by integrating chest X‑rays with clinical data.
